name: missing .jpg
description:
I wrote & developed this over the course of a couple of weeks as way to teach myself bitsy. I have always been fascinated with old technology, and I fear that much of what I once found to be "cutting-edge" is now on the precipice of obsolescence. This was initially intended to be an experimental demo for the player to mess around inside a camera menu. But, as I kept tinkering, the project evolved, and a sort of dialogue came into being. 

These little vignettes are personal & dance in-and-around many truths. I imagine this to be set  in a nondescript future, some time within reach.

I am certainly not a pixel-artist, so special recognition must be given to pixsy. That tool was indispensable when I began this project.
